"Becoming Santa Claus":
"It seems that our presence has
greatly startled everyone in ARKS...
By way of apology, I want to prepare
Christmas gifts for everyone, just as
the legendary Santa once did.
Guardian, can you please help me
procure materials?
※Clear on Normal or higher with
Luther (Christmas) and Harriet (Christmas)
in your party."

"Harriet (Christmas)'s Partner Card
Luther (Christmas)'s Partner Card
※Both do not give any friendship gifts."
